resources.string: Serves Western Maharashtrian and Punjabi Food
Not a member? Sign Up Now
By creating a account to agree to terms of use and privacy policy
Join us now to view complete Profile

Wellcome To Satvik ! 

 Satvik is a revolutionary mess management app designed specifically for college students. Our mission is: to provide students with nutritious, delicious meals tailored to their preferences and dietary needs, and to create employment opportunities for housewives who are passionate about cooking. 

 Our Mission 

 At Satvik, we aim to: 

 Nourish Students: We understand the challenges students face in maintaining a balanced diet amidst their hectic schedules. Satvik ensures that students receive wholesome, home-cooked meals that cater to various dietary preferences, including vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and more.
 Empower Housewives: We believe in empowering housewives by providing them with an opportunity to showcase their culinary talents and earn a sustainable income. Satvik connects these talented individuals with a broader community, allowing them to share their love for cooking while supporting their families.
 What We Offer


Personalized Meal Plans: Students can select meals based on their dietary needs and preferences, ensuring they get the right nutrition every day.
 Convenience and Reliability: With Satvik, students no longer have to worry about meal planning or preparation. Our reliable service ensures timely delivery of fresh, homemade food right to their doorstep.
 Community Connection: Satvik fosters a sense of community by connecting students with local housewives, promoting cultural exchange and mutual support.
 Quality and Hygiene: We prioritize quality and hygiene in all our meals. Each dish is prepared with fresh ingredients and utmost care to meet high standards of cleanliness and taste.

 Why Choose Satvik?
Healthy Eating Made Easy: Our app simplifies the process of finding and receiving nutritious meals, helping students maintain a healthy lifestyle effortlessly. Support Local Cooks: By choosing Satvik, you are supporting local housewives and contributing to their financial independence and empowerment. Variety and Flexibility: Whether you have specific dietary restrictions or simply crave variety, Satvik offers a wide range of meal options to satisfy every palate. User-Friendly Interface: Our app is designed to be intuitive and easy to use, making the entire process from meal selection to delivery seamless and hassle-free. Join the Satvik Family
We invite you to join the Satvik family and experience the joy of healthy eating combined with the warmth of home-cooked meals. Together, we can create a community where everyone benefits – from students enjoying nutritious food to housewives finding meaningful employment.
We\'re committed to providing the best possible experience for our users. \n\n If you encounter any issues while using our app, please let us know so we can resolve them as quickly as possible.

1. Sign Up / Log In 
 New Users: If you’re new to Satvik, sign up using your mobile number. Follow the on-screen instructions to complete your registration. Returning Users: Log in with your existing credentials. 

 2. Browse Food Items 
 After logging in, navigate to the "Food Items" section. Browse through the available food items listed by housewives. You can filter items based on your preferences (e.g., vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free). 

 3. Select Food Items 
 Click on the food item you’re interested in. Review the details including ingredients, price, and available serving times. 

 4. Add to Cart 
 If you decide to order, click the "Add to Cart" button. You can continue browsing and add multiple items to your cart. 

 5. Review and Confirm Order 
 Once you’ve added all desired items to your cart, go to the "Cart" section. Review your order details, including the total price and delivery/pickup times. Make any necessary adjustments or remove items if needed. 

 6. Place Order 
 Click the "Place Order" button. Choose your payment method (e.g., credit/debit card, UPI, cash on delivery). Enter any special instructions for the order if needed (e.g., no spicy, extra cheese). 

 7. Order Confirmation 
 After placing your order, you will receive an order confirmation with the estimated delivery/pickup time. Track your order status in the "My Orders" section. 

 8. Order Received 
 Once you receive your order, you can confirm delivery/pickup in the app. Enjoy your meal! 

 9. Provide Feedback 
 After enjoying your meal, don’t forget to rate and review the food item and the service. Your feedback helps us improve!
